name: Amazon Kendra
short: An intelligent search service powered by machine learning, making it easier to find the needed information within your vast amount of content.
description: Amazon Kendra is a highly accurate and easy-to-use enterprise search service powered by machine learning. Kendra enables organizations to index all their data sources, making that information searchable in a natural language. It understands documents’ context, delivering more precise answers and not just a list of links. It supports multiple data sources like S3, SharePoint, and more. With Kendra, businesses can empower their users with a more intuitive and efficient search experience across their data landscape.
